members.name: Fehintola Ruth Funmilola
members.bio: Fehintola Ruth Funmilola, an Accounting graduate from The Polytechnic Ibadan, embarked on a career in finance, leveraging her analytical skills and strategic mindset. She currently serves as an Accounting Officer/ Admin Officer at Online Dynamics Limited, where she meticulously oversees financial reporting and strategic financial planning. Funmilola is known for her precision in financial analysis and her ability to drive results, making her a valuable asset to the financial team.

I Plan, launch, and manage Facebook Ads campaigns to increase brand awareness and sales. Successfully manage ad campaigns for DriveNation Company, resulting in higher engagement and customer inquiries..
